fr.upmc.colins.farm3.core

Interface Core2CpuI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.interfaces.ComponentImplementedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.TwoWayI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Core2CpuInboundPort, Core2CpuOutboundPort, Core2CpuServiceConnector

    public interface Core2CpuI
extends fr.upmc.components.interfaces.TwoWayI
    The interface Core2CpuI defines the protocol between the core and the cpu

    Description

    The interface can be both required and offered.

    Created on : feb. 2014

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Colins

                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        ask the core to update the clockspeed of the core passed in parameter

        Contract

         pre    a != null
 post   true                    // no postcondition.

        coreId - the core identifier
        Returns:
